item.description:
We invite you to EXPERIENCE SCUBA

at Aquatic Escapes Dive Center!



 Sunday April 7, 2013 at 11:00 am

Located at Aquatic Escapes Dive Center LLC

Fee: $25.

 

~ You'll be given a tutorial of this fascinating sport that will include; photos, videos, and discussions where all your questions can be answered.

~ You'll be fitted and equipped with full scuba gear and given detailed instructions on how to use it.

~ You will then spend time in a heated pool with a certified dive instructor, who will show you how to operate the equipment, basic safety measures, and some underwater maneuvers.

If you find you're hooked on this adventurous sport and want to learn to dive, Mike and Sue, the owners of Aquatic Escapes, will credit you your entire fee for this event towards future dive classes.

On the other hand, if you find that it's not for you at least you had an opportunity to experience what it's all about!

Just think what it would be like next time you travel to the islands. You will no longer be limited to just the surface with a snorkel, but be able to see the real beauty of the underwater world a lot further down. .....and it is amazingly beautiful!

NOTE: This is not a full Scuba diving program and does not result in any certification. The safety covered is minimal and specific to this introduction. If you plan on diving it is advised that you complete a full certification course.

 

Mike and Sue have dive events year round, locally and beyond to the tropics, and they would welcome you to join them anytime. I think you'll find they are the best folks you could ever meet, both on land, and below water! So come join us for 3 to 4 hours of fun getting wet!

A very generous and tasteful arrangement of refreshments will be provided!

SPACE IS LIMITED So RSVP and RESERVE YOUR SPOT TODAY!


Additional information will be mailed to paid RSVPs

Questions? Contact Dana at; danaordway@comcast.net

group.name: Meeting & Greeting in So. NH & the Merrimack Valley :)

item.name: Intro to Scuba Diving
